intro: Distemon miniatus, commonly known as the miniature distemon, is a small flowering plant native to tropical regions. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant features delicate, showy flowers that are typically pink or white in color. Its leaves are heart-shaped and covered in fine hairs, giving it a soft appearance. Distemon miniatus is often cultivated as a ornamental plant due to its compact size and attractive blooms.
